sense.def:
Practical
pomeni tak, ki se nanaša na resnične okoliščine, ne na zamisli ali teorije.

seg.quote: The Party faces practical difficulties of organization and finance.
Practical experience of broadcasting would be valuable.

sense.def:
Kdor je
practical
, težave rešuje razumno in učinkovito.

Zamisli in postopki, ki so
practical
, so taki, da jih lahko uspešno izvedemo.

seg.quote: Their ideas are too opposed to our way of thinking to be considered practical.
How long will it be before nuclear fusion becomes practical?

sense.def:
Oblačila in stvari v hiši, ki so
practical
, so predvsem uporabni, ne pa toliko moderni ali privlačni.

seg.quote: Ceramic tiles are very hard on the feet, though practical.

sense.def:
A practical
je izpit ali učna ura, pri kateri ne pišemo, ampak izdelujemo stvari ali opravljamo poskuse.
